item.title: Graffiti Wall: A commons drawing app
item.description:
I made public space where anyone and everyone can go and scribble anonymously. Probably a mistake, but it taught me a lot.

Graffiti Wall ( frontend code, backend code)

It's the latest step on my journey, stitching together everything I've been learning about self-hosting, deploying a WSGI server, and backing it with a Postgres database.

Please enjoy it!

item.title: An addition app
item.description:
I made a little Addition App ( frontend code, backend code) to stitch together everything I've been learning about self-hosting, deploying a WSGI server, and backing it with a Postgres database.

Please enjoy it!
